alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Polk; Norman; West Becker; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Clay, Norman, south central Polk, northwestern Becker, northeastern Cass and southeastern Traill Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chaffee to near Flom. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fargo, West Fargo, Casselton, Ada, Fertile, Twin Valley and Mapleton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 64 and 103. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 331 and 347. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Polk; Norman; West Becker; West Polk
